Title: BounceSample
Description: Bouncesample is a basic framework for creating Silverlight-based Windows Phone 7 games which meet the mandate that two presses of the Back button exit the user out of the game. It contains a Main Menu, an Options Menu, a "Game", and a Pause Menu.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Bouncesample is a basic framework for creating Silverlight-based Windows Phone 7 games which meet the mandate that two presses of the Back button exit the user out of the game. It contains a Main Menu, an Options Menu, a "Game", and a Pause Menu.
